welcome.title: Welcome to Z
welcome.message: To get started, open a file or create a new one.

clone.urlError: Please enter a valid Git repository URL

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.modalIntro: We collect anonymous data to improve features and stability. You can choose what to share:
analytics.basicDescription: Z version, build code, OS info, usage frequency
analytics.privacy: We never collect personal data or file contents.
analytics.dataPreviewDescription: Only allowed data will be sent. Disabled items (strikethrough) are excluded.
analytics.analyticsDisabled: Analytics disabled, no data will be sent
analytics.onlyBasic: Only basic information will be sent
analytics.analyticsEnabled: Analytics enabled, thank you for helping improve Z
